text:
Jonathan Hardy (20 September 1940 – 30 July 2012) was a New Zealand-Australian movie, television, stage, voice actor, comedian, writer and director. He was in "The Devil's Playground", "Mad Max", "Mr. Reliable", and in "Moulin Rouge!".
Hardy was born on 20 September 1940 in Wellington, New Zealand.
Hardy died on 30 July 2012 in his home in Southern Highlands, New South Wales, Australia from unknown causes, aged 71.
